text: HK Levice is a professional Slovak ice hockey club based in Levice, Slovakia. They currently play in the Slovak 1. Liga. The team was established in 1987. ==History== The first year of the 1987/1988 season, VTJ Levice played in a regional competition that team won league. Since the 1988/1989 competition, the cooperative has played in II. SNHL, which regularly fought until 1993 for a procedure until I. SNHL. ==Honours== ===Domestic=== Slovak 2. Liga * Winners (1): 2018–19 ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Ice hockey teams in Slovakia Category:Ice hockey clubs established in 1987
title: HK Levice
